001
002package com.commercetools.graphql.api;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.Function;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.models.graph_ql.GraphQLError;
008
009public class GraphQLResponse<T> {
010
011    private final GraphQLDataResponse response;
012
013    private final Function<GraphQLData, T> mapper;
014
015    public GraphQLResponse(final GraphQLDataResponse response, final Function<GraphQLData, T> mapper) {
016        this.response = response;
017        this.mapper = mapper;
018    }
019
020    public T getData() {
021        return mapper.apply(response.getData());
022    }
023
024    public List<GraphQLError> getErrors() {
025        return response.getErrors();
026    }
027
028    public static <T> GraphQLResponse<T> of(final GraphQLDataResponse response, final GraphQLRequest<T> request) {
029        return new GraphQLResponse<>(response, request.getDataMapper());
030    }
031}
